Title: Sleeper
Plot: When a burglary turns into a slaughter, Torchwood suspect alien involvement. Who is Beth, and can she be as innocent as she seems? But when the investigation escalates into a city-wide assault, Jack realises that the whole planet is in danger.
GuestStars: Paul Kasey, Nikki Amuka-Bird, Dyfed Potter, Doug Rollins, Claire Cage, Sean Carlson, Victoria Pugh, Luke Rutherford, Alex Harries, Dominic Coleman, William Hughes, Millie Philippart, Matthew Arwel, Derek Lea
